files.name: quiz.py
question.py
player.py

sequence_diagram:
@startuml
participant Main
participant Quiz
participant Question
participant Player
Main -> Quiz : create quiz
Quiz -> Question : create question
Main -> Player : create player
Main -> Player : ask question
Player --> Main : answer
Main -> Quiz : check answer
Quiz -> Question : get correct answer
Quiz --> Main : return result
Main -> Player : update score
@enduml
